entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023
